extendedInfo.description: The new Smartphone-Uplink Display is the ideal display and control tool for your smartphone. The large touchscreen allows you to operate your smartphone comfortably and reliably with your fingers. The brilliant HDMI display ensures maximum readability and sharpness.Attention : This application needs ROOT rights !Get a Smartphone-Uplink Touchscreen TFT display here :http://www.smartphone-uplink.com
